detail_desc: Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim, two buttons, a zip fly, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.
Straight-cut shirt in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut shirt in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with ties at one side. Elasticated seam under the bust and short sleeves. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a lightweight viscose weave with a collar, V-shaped opening at the top and buttons down the front. Cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, concealed elastication at the back of the waist and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.

Long dress in airy weave with a sweetheart neckline and draped, wrapover bodice with a concealed silicone trim at the top and support panels. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, a seam under the bust, and a long, wide skirt. Satin lining.
Trainer sandals in cotton canvas with a hook and loop tab at the front and small loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainer sandals in cotton canvas with a hook and loop tab at the front and small loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Calf-length dress in airy chiffon with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and ties at the sides and a gently flared, tiered skirt. Sewn-in underdress in jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Soft denim jacket in superstretch, washed and flexible denim for maximum mobility. Collar, a frill-trimmed yoke front and back and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Short shorts that can be worn as a skirt in an airy weave. Covered elastication at the back of the waist, a flounce-trimmed, double-layered front section and a decorative bow at the waist.
Short shorts that can be worn as a skirt in an airy weave. Covered elastication at the back of the waist, a flounce-trimmed, double-layered front section and a decorative bow at the waist.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with embroidery on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with embroidery on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with embroidery on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the hem.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small imitation suede appliqué at the hem.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.

Padded mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with reflective print motifs and palms in anti-slip fabric for extra grip. Long shafts with elastication and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the wrists and elastication at the top. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Fleece lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small appliqué at the hem.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small appliqué at the hem.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small appliqué at the hem.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small appliqué at the hem.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small appliqué at the hem.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small appliqué at the hem.
Tube scarf in a soft cable knit with ribbing at the top and bottom.
Tube scarf in a soft cable knit with ribbing at the top and bottom.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed, elasticated cuffs. The polyester content of the gloves is recycled.

Set with a dress and head accessory in printed jersey. Dress with a round neckline and small opening with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the neck. Accessory in double-layered fabric with a hook and loop fastener at the back.
High-waisted leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
High-waisted leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.

Ankle-length dress in a softly draping weave with a V-neck and decorative pleats front and back. Long sleeves and wide, flared cuffs with a slit. Seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt with pleats at the top and a box pleat and concealed slit at the front. Unlined.

Ankle-length dress in a softly draping weave with a V-neck and decorative pleats front and back. Long sleeves and wide, flared cuffs with a slit. Seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt with pleats at the top and a box pleat and concealed slit at the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed, stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline and decorative buttons down the front.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed, stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline and decorative buttons down the front.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed, stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline and decorative buttons down the front.

Long, wide dress in a softly draping weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and flounces at the waist. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top, a seam at the waist and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.

Long, wide dress in a softly draping weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and flounces at the waist. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top, a seam at the waist and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims down the sides and at the hems.

Tunic in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with embroidery. Opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the hem for added volume. Lined with a V-neck inner tunic in woven fabric with adjustable shoulder straps.

Tunic in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with embroidery. Opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the hem for added volume. Lined with a V-neck inner tunic in woven fabric with adjustable shoulder straps.

Shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, concealed pockets in the side seams and short slits in the sides. Unlined.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline with covered elastication, wide, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and narrow ties under the bust. Lined in a cotton weave.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim, straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim, straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a patterned viscose weave with covered elastication at the top and smocking front and back. Long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Frill trim at the top, hem and shoulders.
Baby Exclusive. Soft comfort blanket in airy cotton muslin with a padded moon at the top. Size 30x30 cm.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in bodysuit. Flounce over the shoulders, short sleeves and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in bodysuit. Flounce over the shoulders, short sleeves and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Sun hat in soft linen with a cotton weave lining. Width of brim 5 cm.

Lightweight jacket in a patterned weave with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, front pockets, and elastication at the hem. Lined.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with a chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and a fake fly. Side and back pockets, and buttons at the sides.
Short top in crinkled jersey with embroidery on the front. Wide neckline, decorative buttons down the front and narrow, covered elastication with a frill trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Top in a soft, fine rib knit with a collar, button placket and long sleeves.
Top in a soft, fine rib knit with a collar, button placket and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.

Track jacket in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Woven sections under the arms and at the sides, ribbed cuffs and narrow trims around the collar and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist and twisted drawstring. Broderie anglaise and a scalloped edge at the hem. Lined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Slightly shorter, boxy-style blouse in textured poplin made from recycled cotton. Opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and voluminous, gathered balloon sleeves. Seam at the hem with a double-layered, flared peplum.
Fitted top in a soft, fine, textured knit with short puff sleeves that have narrow trims with concealed elastication.
Fitted top in a soft, fine, textured knit with short puff sleeves that have narrow trims with concealed elastication.
Knee-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon. Regular waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon. Regular waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon. Regular waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon. Regular waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon. Regular waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon. Regular waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, zipped front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Shorter, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and cut-out section over one shoulder.
Shorter, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and cut-out section over one shoulder.
Knee-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with narrow ties, and an overlocked hem. Unlined.
Short skirt in an airy, patterned weave. High waist with covered elastication, and two flounced tiers to the hem. Lined.
Short skirt in an airy, patterned weave. High waist with covered elastication, and two flounced tiers to the hem. Lined.
